fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document); Clio Infra (clioinfra.eu).
fxInfo_clarification: Average height estimates are organized by birth decade. Missing data within a time-series is interpolated using linear interpolation.
fxInfo_question: What is the average height of the population?
fxInfo_sources: Clio Infra (clio-infra.eu), drawing on Baten and Blum (2012).
name: e_peheight
